name: Press' Innov
tag_list: cross-media, nosql, bigdata, marklogic, orbeon, xml, java
overview:
We are an IT services company based in Lyon and Paris.

We use cutting-edge technologies that enable our customers to enrich and increase their content production, print and web communication and data. We therefore aim to assist the development of our customers by helping them to optimise their content management.

We specialise in particular in the Media – News – Publishing sector, having gleaned a very sound knowledge of its activities, strategic and technological challenges. We have the methodological, functional and technical expertise required to effectively meet the needs of the sector with innovative solutions. We are experts in producing editorial content that is usable in several formats, not linked to any specific medium. We are working for communication/marketing departments, in several sectors, to help them to enhance their cross media publishing: website, magazine, mobiles apps, e-book,…

We also offer our services to companies who need to create complex forms or databases for their activities. Using innovative tools, we are able to design a database for stock control, a form for complex information searches for websites, documentation centres, and create mobile applications, etc…

We also offer a solution for making your IT systems secure via strong authentication.

We employ a methodology that is adapted to the needs of all our customers with a constant exchange of information, allowing for adjustments if necessary. Our team’s expertise guarantees optimum integration.

Our strength lies in the constant quest for innovation, for this is how we provide an effective response daily to the challenges facing our customers and offer operational solutions to the needs of the end user.
